# Janitorial Services for RCMP Wadena Detachment

## Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids for janitorial services at the RCMP Wadena Detachment, Wadena, Saskatchewan. The contract period will be for two years with an option to extend for three additional one-year periods.

## Requirement
The selected contractor will be responsible for providing all necessary labour, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision to maintain a clean and safe environment at the RCMP Wadena Detachment.

## Procurement Terms
This is an open tender. However, the procurement may be conditionally set-aside for Indigenous businesses under the Government of Canada's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more eligible bids are received.

## Security and Site Visit
Security requirements are included in the solicitation. A site visit will be offered to shortlisted bidders. Refer to the attached tender documents for details.

## Evaluation Criteria
Tenders will be evaluated based on the completeness and responsiveness of the bid. The lowest priced bid will be recommended for award.

## Submission Requirements
Bids must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit in accordance with the instructions provided in the Invitation to Tender (ITT).

## Language of Submissions
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
* Debbie McPherson
* Telephone: 16396253567
* Email: [Debbie.McPherson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:Debbie.McPherson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* Fax (not applicable)

## Attachment
The tender documents, including the Invitation to Tender (ITT) and Annex “A” - Janitorial Services, are available for download at the following URL:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23938/m5000-20-5818a---itt_en.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23938/m5000-20-5818a---itt_fr.pdf (French)

## Closing Date
The tender closing date is 2023-12-04T15:00:00.
